body_html:
That's perfect, thanks!

On Thu, Oct 27, 2016 at 2:35 PM, Sanders Kleinfeld <notifications@github.com

wrote:

@martinwicke https://github.com/martinwicke, since we need to update
regardless, I think it would be ideal to replace the Monitors tutorial with
a new one on Hooks. I will work with @ispirmustafa
https://github.com/ispirmustafa on that.

—
